introShort: Essential contacts and hotlines. Tap for immediate help and support services.
tts_intro: Here are essential emergency contacts and support services.

emergency-crisis-hotlines.title: Emergency & Crisis Hotlines
emergency-crisis-hotlines.subtitle: 24/7 crisis support, suicide prevention, urgent help
emergency-crisis-hotlines.tip: Call 112 for emergencies. Mental health crisis lines are available 24/7.

legal-asylum-help.title: Legal & Asylum Help
legal-asylum-help.subtitle: Free legal advice, asylum support, NGO assistance
legal-asylum-help.tip: Contact Diakonie or Caritas for free legal consultation and asylum support.

housing-shelter-hotlines.title: Housing & Shelter Hotlines
housing-shelter-hotlines.subtitle: Emergency housing, homelessness prevention, shelter support
housing-shelter-hotlines.tip: Call housing assistance hotlines immediately if facing eviction or homelessness.

healthcare-support-lines.title: Healthcare Support Lines
healthcare-support-lines.subtitle: Medical emergencies, health insurance, doctor referrals
healthcare-support-lines.tip: Call 1450 for medical advice or visit emergency rooms for urgent care.

food-essentials.title: Food & Essentials
food-essentials.subtitle: Food banks, essential supplies, emergency assistance
food-essentials.tip: Visit local Caritas or food banks for free meals and essential supplies.

children-family-support.title: Children & Family Support
children-family-support.subtitle: Child protection, family counseling, parenting help
children-family-support.tip: Contact child welfare services for protection and family support programs.

work-exploitation.title: Work & Exploitation
work-exploitation.subtitle: Labor rights, wage theft, workplace abuse reporting
work-exploitation.tip: Report workplace exploitation to labor inspection or worker rights organizations.

everyday-life-help.title: Everyday Life Help
everyday-life-help.subtitle: General assistance, bureaucracy help, translation services
everyday-life-help.tip: NGOs offer translation and bureaucratic assistance for daily life challenges.

community-integration-ngos.title: Community & Integration NGOs
community-integration-ngos.subtitle: Integration support, community programs, cultural help
community-integration-ngos.tip: Join community integration programs offered by local NGOs for social support.

directory-quick-access.title: Directory & Quick Access
directory-quick-access.subtitle: Phone directory, online resources, service finder
directory-quick-access.tip: Use online directories and service finders to quickly locate help in your area.
